input.content: We are going to play a game of word association. I want you to guess the secret word. I will give you 5 words, the secret word is related to all 5 of these words. The secret word is 5 characters long. What is the secret word? Before answering, reason in a step-by-step manner as to get the right answer, then conclude with the answer in the following format: The secret word is: [<secret-word.lower()>] because <reasoning>
